mapper.select: select sum(e.commAmt) as commAmt,DATE_FORMAT( endTime, '%Y-%m-%d') as time from eb_clearing_bonus e left join eb_clearing_final f on f.id = e.clearingId where e.uid =#{uid} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( endTime, '%Y-%m-%d')

select sum(e.commAmt) as commAmt,DATE_FORMAT( endTime, '%Y-%m-%d') as time,levelName from eb_clearing_bonus e left join eb_clearing_final f on f.id = e.clearingId where e.uid = #{uid} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( endTime, '%Y-%m-%d'),e.levelName
